type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskOutputs
type.description: Helper interface for binary compatibility with Gradle 2.x version of the TaskOutputs interface. @deprecated The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 4.0.

method.name: dir
method.description:
Registers an output directory for this task.
param:path The output directory. The given path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).

returns:this

method.name: file
method.description:
Registers some output file for this task.
param:path The output file. The given path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).

returns:this

method.name: files
method.description:
Registers some output files for this task.
param:paths The output files. The given paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

returns:this
